docs.snippet: Over the last 20 days, Kyle Larson went to victory lane in NASCAR's second tier Xfinity Series and picked up a pair of wins in his sprint car. He knocked off several podium finishes during Ohio Sprint Speedweek and finished third in NASCAR's main ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Over the last 20 days, Kyle Larson went to victory lane in NASCAR's second tier Xfinity Series and picked up a pair of wins in his sprint car. He knocked off several podium finishes during Ohio Sprint Speedweek and finished third in NASCAR's main event at Michigan.

headline.main: Kyle Larson Eyeing Sonoma as Site of 1st Sprint Cup Victory
headline.print_headline: Kyle Larson Eyeing Sonoma as Site of 1st Sprint Cup Victory
